current.mlvedaACS_messageContent: <<shop.name>> process all orders in <<shop.currency>>. While the content of your cart is currently displayed in <<shop.selected_currency>>, you will checkout using <<shop.currency>> at the most current exchange rate.

settings.content: Subscribe to receive 10% off your first order, get the latest updates and exclusive sales.

settings.quote: "My friends introduced me to Destructive and I was sold straight away. The fit, quality and price point are unbeatable." - Justin K.

settings.answer:
We have a 30 day returns policy. This means that from the day you receive your order, you have 30 days to get the item returned to us.

If we receive a return after 30 days, we can still offer a credit note.
settings.title: How long do I have to return my item?

settings.answer:
PayPal Returns On Us

If you wish to use a free of charge return solution, we recommend ordering using PayPal.

If you paid using PayPal, you can make the most of their Returns On Us service. PayPal will reimburse the cost of returning your order to your PayPal account. For more information please select your country: 

Australia, Austria, Belgium, Brazil, Bulgaria, Canada, China, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Hong Kong, Hungary, India, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Malaysia, Malta, Norway, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Russia, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, South Africa, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, UK, USA

If you order without using PayPal or PayPal don't offer their 'Returns On Us' service for your country, the shipping cost will not be reimbursed.

Exchanges

The exchange order will be sent out free of charge on the standard shipping option for each country.
settings.title: Are returns / exchanges free?

settings.answer: As soon as we have dispatched your order, you will receive an email from us with your tracking number.
settings.title: How will I know my order has been dispatched?

settings.answer:
UK

Please note that transit times quoted are in working days and exclude our processing time if ordered after our cut off point. Due to the current global crisis, delivery to some addresses may incur minor delays.

1 - 2 day delivery (Monday - Saturday) 

2 - 3 day delivery (Monday - Saturday)

International

Please note that transit times quoted are in working days, exclude our processing time if ordered after our cut off point and are subject to change depending upon the destination locations within each country. Deliveries to remote areas may take longer and due to the current global crisis, delivery to some countries may incur minor delays.

For a full breakdown of international delivery times, please use this link.
settings.title: How long does shipping take?

settings.answer: Once an order has been dispatched, we are unable to amend any delivery address details. Please note that any unsuccessful delivery attempts that get returned to us will incur a £20 surcharge, this is passed on from our courier.
settings.title: Can I change my delivery address although my order has been dispatched?

settings.answer:
UK

UK orders will be dispatched same day Monday - Friday if placed before 2PM GMT. Orders placed after this will be dispatched the next working day.*

International

International orders will be dispatched the same day Monday - Friday if placed before 12PM GMT. Any orders placed after this will be dispatched the next working day.*

* Although we take all precautions to protect our staff, we reserve the right at anytime to cancel all agreed cut off times should our service levels be affected due to staff having to self isolate in accordance with current government policy.
settings.title: How long will it take to process my order?

settings.answer:
Usually, we ask for 1 working day to inspect and process your return or exchange. However, due to current order volumes your return or exchange may take up to 3 working days to process.

Depending on your payment method it can take anywhere from 1-10 working days to receive the refund.
settings.title: How long do returns take?

settings.answer:
UK - No customs

Europe - No customs with our standard delivery method. Standard delivery orders are shipped DDP (Delivered Duties Paid). You will not be charged any taxes upon receiving your order.

Our express option is shipped (Delivered Duties Unpaid). We are working on a solution for this, but for now express may incur taxes. If you do not wish to pay taxes, we advise you select standard delivery.

Hong Kong - No customs

United States - Orders under $800 will be tax free

Canada - Orders under $35 will be tax free

Australia - Orders under $1000 will be tax free

Japan - Orders under ¥10000 will be tax free 

United Arab Emirates - Orders under 1000 AED will be tax free

South Korea - Orders under $150 will be tax free

If your country is not listed above, please visit your local government's website for details on customs and taxes.
settings.title: Will I get charged customs on my order?

settings.answer: Whilst we do offer returns on sale items, we can only offer store credit or exchanges. If you opt for store credit, it cannot then be refunded for cash.
settings.title: Can I return sale items?

settings.answer: We will email your tracking details to you along with your dispatch confirmation. You may also receive text updates from the courier depending on the delivery method you opted for.
settings.title: How can I track my order?

settings.answer:
Can I cancel my order?

If you wish to cancel your order, please contact customer service as soon as possible. We will make every effort to accommodate your request. However, once an order has been submitted, we cannot guarantee that the purchase can be cancelled.

Can I change my delivery address?

If you have made a mistake with your address when placing your order, please contact customer service as soon as possible so we can try to amend your details. Please quote your order number in the subject line to speed up the process up. 

If you input the incorrect address at checkout, we can not be held accountable if the order goes missing. We are not liable to refund/replace this order.
settings.title: Can I cancel / edit my order?

settings.answer: Please take a look at our online returns policy to find out more. Please note that rejected international deliveries will incur a £20 restocking fee and can take up to 15 working days to receive. This is a surcharge passed onto us by the courier.
settings.title: What if I no longer require the order?

settings.answer:
We only accept returns/exchanges on unworn products, sent back in their original condition with the original packaging. If you believe your item arrived faultily, please contact customer service immediately. 

To start your return or exchange, please visit this link.
settings.title: How do I return / exchange my order?

settings.answer:
We work hard to ensure our clothes are a true fit. Should you be unsure, we recommend you select your usual size. If you are between a size, we would suggest choosing the bigger size of the two. If you want to ask the experts, our customer care team will be able to help you.

Alternatively, you can use the size guide on each product page.
settings.title: Are your products true to size?
Our story

settings.title: Popup
settings.content: You can use this popup to display some useful information to your customers.
ORDERS TO EUROPE INCLUDE TAXES. NO ADDITIONAL CHARGES AT CUSTOMS WITH STANDARD DELIVERY ONLY.
ORDER BEFORE 12PM GMT MON - FRI FOR SAME DAY DISPATCH

settings.heading: STATE OF THE ART
settings.content:
After yet another year of incredible growth, fuelled by our first ever content creator campaign, it was time to upgrade. 

We launched our new, state of the art distribution centre.

August 2019

settings.heading: RETRO PANT
settings.content:
2018 was a great year for our iconic Retro Pant. Overwhelmed by the success and demand for our original Retro Pants, we released what went on to become one of our best selling products of all time.

The Retro Pant V2.

settings.heading: THE RISE
settings.content:
Destructive started gaining rapid traction through 2017. By the summer of 2017 we reached our 10,000th customer and sold to over 100 countries.

June 2017

settings.heading: INCEPTION
settings.content:
With the idea and passion of creating progressive, premium and street-rooted garments, Ben and the team created Destructive.

December 2016
